pages.text: The $(item)Lamp of Sanctuary$(), while being a great decorational piece, also has another very useful function: When supplied with a $(thing)redstone signal$(), it will cause any monsters in an area of up to about 48 blocks around it to $(thing)stop appearing$() altogether, no matter the light level. For this, the strength of the redstone signal determines the range. Every time a monster is ceased, a small amount of $(aura) is used.
